title: Discount
description: This is an offer from the supplier to the purchaser, to reduce the payment amount if the payment is made within a certain period of time.

description.title: Description
description.description: Describes the discounting rules in detail.

code.title: Code
code.description: The description of the `discountValue` attribute. e.g percentage, currency, 3for2 etc. Can be enumerated, custom values allowed.

value.title: Value
value.description: If the discount description indicates a percentage or similar formulaic value, it is represented here, can be percentage or currency amount.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The minimum amount of items or price for the discount to qualify.
